alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 8:08PM EDT until July 01 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Otsego County in central New York... Central Chenango County in central New York... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 808 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Norwich, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Norwich, Edmeston, North Norwich, Oxford, Pittsfield, New Lisbon, Preston, New Berlin and Otego. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
